Line 266: Line 266:
On April 27, 2011, Obama provided to the press. An image of the birth certificate, which confirms all of the details that were provided in 2008 on the short-form certification, was posted on the whitehouse.gov website.<ref>[http://www.whitehouse.gov/sites/default/files/rss_viewer/birth-certificate-long-form.pdf]</ref> At a press conference held shortly after the release, Trump stated that was "Today I'm very proud of myself, because I've accomplished something that nobody else has been able to accomplish". Trump reiterated his doubts about the newly-released document's authenticity, saying,"We have to look at it, we have to see... is it real? Is it proper? What's on it? But I hope it checks out beautifully".
On April 27, 2011, Obama provided to the press. An image of the birth certificate, which confirms all of the details that were provided in 2008 on the short-form certification, was posted on the whitehouse.gov website.<ref>[http://www.whitehouse.gov/sites/default/files/rss_viewer/birth-certificate-long-form.pdf]</ref> At a press conference held shortly after the release, Trump stated that was "Today I'm very proud of myself, because I've accomplished something that nobody else has been able to accomplish". Trump reiterated his doubts about the newly-released document's authenticity, saying,"We have to look at it, we have to see... is it real? Is it proper? What's on it? But I hope it checks out beautifully".
â
Trump also voiced new doubts about the validity of Obama's education. Said Trump: "I heard he was a terrible student, terrible. How does a bad student go to Columbia and then to Harvard? I'm thinking about it, I'm certainly looking into it." Trump called on Obama to release records from Occidental College, a Hawaii college Obama attended for two years during the 1979-1981 period.
+
Trump also voiced new doubts about the validity of Obama's education. Said Trump: "I heard he was a terrible student, terrible. How does a bad student go to Columbia and then to Harvard? I'm thinking about it, I'm certainly looking into it." Trump called on Obama to release records from Occidental College, which Obama attended during the 1979-1981 period.
In the wake of Trump's statements about US President Obama, there have been public calls for NBC to fire Trump from his role on The Apprentice-- most notably from sister-network MSNBC host Lawrence O'Donnell and from US Congressman Anthony Weiner. <ref>[http://nation.foxnews.com/donald-trump/2011/04/08/msnbc-host-wants-parent-company-fire-trump MSNBC Host Wants Parent Company to Fire Trump] [http://washingtonscene.thehill.com/in-the-know/36-news/9131-weiner-nbc-should-tell-trump-youre-fired Weiner: NBC Should Tell Trump "You're Fired"]</ref>
In the wake of Trump's statements about US President Obama, there have been public calls for NBC to fire Trump from his role on The Apprentice-- most notably from sister-network MSNBC host Lawrence O'Donnell and from US Congressman Anthony Weiner. <ref>[http://nation.foxnews.com/donald-trump/2011/04/08/msnbc-host-wants-parent-company-fire-trump MSNBC Host Wants Parent Company to Fire Trump] [http://washingtonscene.thehill.com/in-the-know/36-news/9131-weiner-nbc-should-tell-trump-youre-fired Weiner: NBC Should Tell Trump "You're Fired"]</ref>
